title: Microsoft shows off the 'magical' cameras in the Lumia flagships
text:
Microsoft shows off the 'magical' cameras in the Lumia flagships 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
In a blog post, Microsoft's director of cameras, Juha Alakarhu, goes over all features in the recently announced Lumia 950 and 950 XL which ...
